posts.post_content:
T206 Heinie Wagner (Bat on Left Shoulder) - BVG 1 -$25 SOLD

Would prefer to trade for something roughly equivalent in either a PSA slab or raw. I need plenty of different T206s so pretty much anything would be of interest.  While graded POOR -- because of a pin hole in the top -- this card is otherwise in reasonably good condition. 

Send an email or post a response.  I know it is not much but I am doing all I can to build a set economically.

Thanks,
Andy
